attributes.action: No to the demolition of the Tropicana
attributes.additional_details: The local council do not want the Tropicana site to go ahead, dismissing numerous opportunities to the refurbishment put forward by many different business men. however the local council need to act now to preserve this site for the children and future generations. The local community believe its not fair, right and does not represent the views they hold. I urge everyone who feels strongly that weston must preserve the tropicana site, to sign this petition and show the council we need to be heard for the good of the local community.
